text: In order to keep themselves looking as youthful as ever, the host of Live with Kelly and Ryan reportedly participates in a strange pre - show ritual so they look fresh - faced just before the cameras start rolling! According to the National Enquirer, Ryan Seacrest allegedly dunks his face into ice water before facing the ABC cameras. This reportedly keeps the media mogul ’ s face looking young and fresh. Reportedly, Ryan Seacrest ( with Kelly Ripa ) participated in a strange pre - show ritual in order to keep his face looking fresh.
